profile:
Carleton Refrigeration, Heating and Air Conditioning Ltd.

"Your Comfort Specialists"

Our team of award winning professionals provide quality installation and service of Furnaces, Central Air Conditioning, Ductless Splits, Heat Pumps, Geothermal Systems, Water Heaters, Boilers, and Heat Recovery Ventilators (HRV).

Serving West Ottawa and the Ottawa Valley for 45 Years. A+ Member of BBB www.carletonrefrigeration.com

profile:
We are a family run business with a total of 20 YEARS of field experience. 

Industry prices are forever increasing, but we strive to keep our services affordable without ever having to sacrifice quality. 

From wearing boot covers, and using drop sheets in your home so we don’t make a mess, to properly assessing your space and equipment for the right solutions, and providing a customer satisfaction follow-up call after a job, we want to make sure you’re satisfied with the WAMBOLDT experience.

profile:
We're a local company that has served this area for three generations. We’re committed to providing our customers with affordable, detailed service and fast job turnaround times. We offer a range of options and convenient scheduling for such projects as:

Fuel tank removal
Fuel tank installation

Water heater service and repair
Emergency generator fuel supply system service

Mannion Petroleum can provide you with a 613/819 area technician who makes customer satisfaction the number one priority. We’re in the office Monday – Friday, 8am – 5pm. Whether you want basic repairs or your needs are a little more complex, our knowledgeable technicians are ready to offer fast, efficient service. Contact us today to schedule a free estimate.

profile:
Watson Electrical is a full-service Electrical installation and repair Contractor, that has been in business since 1983, serving residential and commercial customers in the Ottawa and surrounding area.
 
Our goal is to provide timely, professional and excellent service on every job we perform.
 
Our licenced electricians are provincial trained, knowledgeable and experienced. They are trustworthy and respectful with all customers.
 
We can help you upgrade electrical panels, repair old wiring, install new outlets, switches, and lighting. We trouble shoot and repair the electrical problem(s) in your home or business.
 
Our Skilled electricians make your home and business electrically safe.
 
We are fully licenced and insured.
 
ESA ECRA# 7000302
services: Commercial and residential electrical renovation, EV chargers, LED retrofit.
